CustomField.description: If Inherit Opportunity Contract Terms is false, the Contract Term will be set on the Opportunity Product to (Default Contract Term + Product Number of Free Months) and reset to this value when an Opportunity contract term change is made. For month-to-month products.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Inherit Opportunity Contract Terms is false, the Contract Term will be set on the Opportunity Product to (Default Contract Term + Product Number of Free Months) and reset to this value when an Opportunity contract term change is made.
CustomField.label: Default Contract Term
